::Havoc/Repressor::

Havoc growls, firing a few warning shots at Wolfgang' feet. THe shots
were warning shots because they wern't aimed at anything vital.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor jumps to the side, firing his missile launcher first at the
door control an then at the floor under Wolfgang. The door controls
explode, leaving the door permenately closed (well, untill it's opened
from the other side).



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Wolf Gang" <WarBarge@h...> wrote:
> :: Wolfgang ::
> 
> :: Jumps up from the floor, shaken, but not stirred. ::
> 
> Accidents, aye?
> 
> :: Wolfgang finnaly realises that he is outgunned, and outnumbered.
::
> 
> Scum like you do not deserve to kill a grand warrior like me, so if
you'd 
> excuse me, i'll be leaving now.
> 
> :: Wolfgang attempts to start his artic afterburners, but nothing
happens. 
> He realises that theres only one way out. ::
> 
> Beastmode!
> 
> :: Transforms to a mighty artic wolf and starts running, heading
towards a 
> gap between the armed bots. ::
>
